Name: Steakhouse Tango
Review Text: Bad quality of meat, can't recommend this place, tourists trap outside of tourist hotspot. Just look at the right corner of the picture of the "rib-eye"-steak..

Name: Steakhouse Tango
Review Text: The food was good and not overpriced. The waiter was incredibly nice, fast and attentive. But the music was pretty loud and I expected the steak to be medium since no one asked me, was pretty rare in the end. If you go there make sure to tell them how you want your steak.

Name: Steakhouse Tango
Review Text: This an Argentinian small steakhouse, the  place is very cozy to have lunch or dinner. Prices may vary depending of your selection is still affordable and not expensive. The server was so kind and humble. We recommend this place for the meat lovers.

Name: Steakhouse Tango
Review Text: I’m not picky, I wasn’t expecting much but I still got disappointed. Staffing is inappropriate, with one cook and one waiter for the whole restaurant (20mins wait to place an order even though the place was 80% empty). The 1/2 liter sangria …

Name: Steakhouse Tango
Review Text: The food was good but a little overpriced. We asked for a mixed grill, but the dish was "confusing": while some elements were very good, others not so much. There is only one cook and one waiter for the whole restaurant but they were extremely nice and the service didn't take long.

Name: Steakhouse Tango
Review Text: Had some yummy steak and lamb chops. Dishes come with salad and fries or potato. We ordered some extra veggies but in the end it was a bit too much for us so side dishes are really necessary.

Name: Steakhouse Tango
Review Text: Nicely done steak, side decoration require improvement considering the price. Side dish is good. Very friendly waiter and chef.  Highly recommended if you could look past the side decoration. :)

Name: Steakhouse Tango
Review Text:

Name: Steakhouse Tango
Review Text: Really good service, the waiter was really kind. The steak was perfect and the sangria as well.

Name: Steakhouse Tango
Review Text: One of the best steaks I've ever had. Waitstaff were attentive without being annoying. Left feeling content without being over-stuffed. Would highly recommend!

Name: Steakhouse Tango
Review Text:

Name: Steakhouse Tango
Review Text: Good place to eat. Steak was very nice, staff polite and kind, service was fast!

Name: Steakhouse Tango
Review Text: Avoid dessert and coffe. Meat was very good.

Name: Steakhouse Tango
Review Text: I came to this restaurant when my first choice was booked and I’m SO GLAD I did! The food was outstanding, the atmosphere was warm and inviting, and the staff could not have been nicer. I had a Malbec, the Argentinian goulash, and the appetizer sampler. That had some of the best ribs I’ve had in my life. I highly recommend!

Name: Steakhouse Tango
Review Text: Awesome place, the steaks and the seafood is wonderful. I can recommend it!

Name: Steakhouse Tango

Name: Steakhouse Tango
Review Text: The steak was ok for the price, not many choice for drinks, especially beers, the servers themselves say the house wine is bad don't take it , why keep it on the menu? Small congested interiors, felt like i am sitting and eating in a noisy cluttered kitchen.

Name: Steakhouse Tango
Review Text: Poor service. They serve prefabricated burgers which was really like a chewing gum, also the french fries where cold and soggy. They forgot the side orders for my friends that have ordered different steaks. Five minutes later they served …

Name: Steakhouse Tango
Review Text: Had the Parrillada for 2 people, very generous portion, delicious meat and fair price. Staff is very friendly. Food took a while to arrive but it's reasonable considering the quality and quantity of the meal. We were allowed to take leftovers home. I highly recommend this place!

Name: Steakhouse Tango
Review Text: Nice location and the food also good.

Name: Steakhouse Tango
Review Text: Fantastic customer service. He speaks most languages so please do not be afraid to go in if you do not speak English or Dutch. Amazing food, we still talk about our steak today as it was so nice and cooked to perfection.

Name: Steakhouse Tango
Review Text: Great waitstaff.. Quick and polite. Got a steak combo and a beer... Not the best steak in the world but certainly passable. Would return and try the platter instead. Thank you for your kind service :)

Name: Steakhouse Tango
